Description: Al Jouf Agricultural Development (known as: ALJOUF) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. It operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Agricultural Products. It has Company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Agricultural Products. ALJOUF is based in Aljouf, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1988.
